page.title: 08 Transport
page.content: The only transport method is by {road.}The{A165}dual carriageway takes traffic to the centre of Hull. A survey of the Saltshouse Road area showed that:- 80% of the people in our area own {cars}and 70% of these people have garages. 90% of the garages are private. The most popular car is made by{Ford.}The most popular car colour is{blue. 1981}and{1984}registration cars were the most popular. The most common way to travel if you don't have a{car}is by{bus.}8 out of 10 people use public{transport} regularly. There is also a free{bus} which can be caught to Asda hypermarket. Situated down Saltshouse Road there are 2{lollypop ladies.}One is positioned outside Saltshouse school the other just outside Lambwath.
